amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Legal Services Corporation by $109 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for the Legal Services Corporation by approximately $109 million. Appropriations for various accounts in the bill would be reduced commensurately.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mollohan amendment (A013) Agreed to by recorded vote: 246 - 176 (Roll no. 449).
